nodes.text: A member of the Wheel Security Force, the force which maintained order on the Wheel space station, acted as an informant for the Imperial Security Bureau during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. After a message pod from the Confederacy of Independent Systems Munificent-class star frigate Sa Nalaor was found near the Wheel and brought to the station, the informant provided the bureau with a full copy of all the data in the pod before it was given its intended recipients, the tech company IsoTech.
The informant was first mentioned 2013 in Beyond the Rim, an adventure module written by Sterling Hershey for the Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game, Star Wars: Edge of the Empire.
